children.text: There is a visible scratch in the roofing sheet, which looks poorly finished.
Victorian Building Authority’s, Guide to Standards and Tolerances clause 6.02 Roof cladding states that

‘Staining, folds, splits, dents, open joints between panels, cracking and other distortions in roof cladding is defective if it is visible from a normal viewing position at ground level or an upper floor level. Any corrosion of roof cladding is defective unless it is caused by a lack of maintenance or damaged by the owner’ .
This section of roof sheet should be replaced with a new one.
